name: Morgan Gangwere
tagline: The exploits of a small-time developer
body:
# What I am

I'm Morgan Gangwere, also sometimes known as `indrora` in dev scenes. I've done some fun things with just about anything I can get my hands on, and recently finished a degree in Network Administration (because I needed something to do). I've built [Demoscene scrollers](https://gist.github.com/indrora/4055992) on OLED devices, Built my own version of Android and even taught people how laser cutters work.



# Things I maintain

* [Atomic](/Atomic/) - A moderately hefty IRC client for Android.
* [My ZSH prompt theme](https://github.com/indrora/zsh-prompt-powerline) - based on Powerline.

# Other places I exist

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/indrora/)
* [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/) 
* [My personal Tumblog](http://indrora.tumblr.com) where I yell at things.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
